headline: The Republic of Korea Selects L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (LHX) for Airborne Early Warning and Control Aircraft Program
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is among the 10 Largest Defense Stocks in 2025. On October 20, the company announced that it had been selected by the Republic of Korea for its airborne early warning and control (AEW&C) program. Under the contract, the firm will partner with Bombardier, Korean Air, and ELTA Systems to deliver modified […]
